ing: 2 cups cherries, pitted and coarsely chopped
des: "Savory ricotta and feta cheese combined with sweet, fresh cherries and a dash of coriander - delish! This goes exceptionally well with a whole wheat flatbread or pita."
ins: Combine chopped cherries with accumulated juices, ricotta cheese, feta cheese, coriander, sugar, and lemon juice in a large bowl. Chill before serving.
